pets: Dark Dog - increases punch speed by 0.5x
Dark Cat - every 5 mins emits an aura that boosts your speed
Eclipse Frog - slows enemies every 10 mins
Eclipse Butterfly - steals 3% DE with 11% double chance
Candy Cow - boosts punch & speed by 1.5x
Ballistic Bull - slows enemies with DE by 0.5x
Carnatic Mouse - shields you from getting dined for 1min
Chill Mammoth - reduces pet cooldown by 2 mins
Chronicle Monkey - copies random pet ability
Chronicle Moth - skips benches for 1 min
